string.text: The place where zombies appear
Don't let zombies get close to the stalkers on the roof
Cover the stalkers on the roof while they work the installation valve. Don't let zombies get near the repair squad on the roof!
The place where zombies appear
Don't let zombies get close to the stalkers in the hangar
Cover the stalkers in the hangar while they work the installation valve. Don't let zombies get near the repair squad in the hangar!
Defend the scientists' base
Defend the scientists' base
Defend the scientists' base
As long as zombies are attacking, the doors of the scientists' bunker are blocked. Repel the zombie attack to get inside the bunker and see the scientists
Talk to Sakharov
Strelok has left to see the scientists at Yantar. Go to Yantar and talk to professor Sakharov. He may know where to find Strelok
The path to the Red Forest is open
Go to the Red Forest
The cooling station has been repaired and stabilized, so psy-emissions are at a minimum. The way to the Red Forest is safe. Go to the Red Forest - that's where Strelok is heading
text in default
text in default
text in default
Don't let the repair team die
Hold your position!
Hold your position!
Take the documents to Sakharov
Take the documents to Sakharov
Take the documents to Sakharov. They will help him understand why Yantar became home to such strong psy-emission levels
Fight your way through to the device
Fight your way through to the factory
The area around the factory is full of zombies. Join up with Lefty and his group to fight your way inside. Hurry - the psy-field level may become critical at any minute
Find the documents
Find PDA with documents

A group of stalkers found important documents in the factory area. They may help Sakharov determine the cause of the powerful psy-field at Yantar. The group's signal died near the factory exit. Find the PDA with the documents
Meet Lefty
Meet Lefty's group
A group of stalkers is getting ready to fight their way through to the factory while the psy-emissions are at their lowest. Meet Lefty, the group's commander
Take up a position on the hangar roof
Follow the stalker onto the hangar roof
Lefty ordered everyone to assume their positions. Follow the stalker onto the roof and get in position
